title: The Tell-Tale Heart
description: A man confronts himself and an unknown listener with his desire to murder an old man.In this classic psychological thriller, the reader will find many more questions than answers. Even though this is one of Poe's shortest stories, nevertheless it has become one of his most highest regarded works. It is a profound and, at times, ambiguous investigation of the paranoia that may lie within the depths of one man's mind...
author: Edgar Allan Poe
